overview: The Best FIFA Football Awardsâ„¢ will be held for the second time on 23 October 2017, the latest incarnation of the annual awards events that FIFA has staged since 1991, when the FIFA World Player Gala was founded. FIFA.com has all the details on this new event, which celebrates the very best of the 2016/17 season.
tagline: FIFA AWARDS, The Best FIFA Awards 2017
title: The Best FIFA Football Awards 2017
